ValidationRule.description: Return to Marketing with a Duplicate reason requires Opportunity to be populated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY ), ISPICKVAL(Disposition__c, 'Return to Marketing'), ISPICKVAL(Return_to_Marketing_Reasons__c, 'Duplicate'), ISBLANK(Converted_Opportunity__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must link an Opportunity to select 'Return to Marketing' with a 'Duplicate' reason.
